    • Method Detail

      • convolveSymmetricCentered

        public static final void convolveSymmetricCentered(float[] a,
                                                   int aoff,
                                                   int alen,
                                                   float[] f,
                                                   float[] r,
                                                   int roff)
        Convolve the input 'a' (which begins at offset aoff and is alen elements in length) with the filter 'f', depositing the result in 'r' at the offset 'roff'. f.length should be odd. The output is shifted by -f.length/2, so that there is no net time delay.

      • convolveSymmetricCenteredMax

                                                      int roff)

      • makeGaussianFilter

        public static float[] makeGaussianFilter(double sigma,
                                         int n)
        Computes gaussian low-pass filter with L1 Norm of 1.0 (all elements add up). N should be odd.
